sentences.sentence: A neon sign creates a momentary distraction but reorients all guests to new views.
sentences.translation: 阿霓虹灯创建了一个短暂的干扰，但重新定位的新观点客人。

sentences.sentence: It reorients the functions of bicycle paths at all levels and analyze the distribution of right-of-way at different levels as well as the sign arrangement.
sentences.translation: 重新定位自行车各级道路功能，并分析各级路网上的路权分配、相应的指标设置。
